content: I am thinking of just Bicing my head. Nekkid heads are sexy, hooah? It looks good now: nice fade from a zero to a #2 on the top. But I am still thinking of shaving it all. Talk to me. What do I do? Question: I have a high and tight, and pictures will be posted. Do I: Choices: Leave it as is - we love your face as is Bic it, babe - make that flash shine like never before! Post before and after picture regardless - I love you Never, ever again post your ugly mug here - haircut or otherwise Dude, you're just stupid - first beer is on me   It's not that there is no God or that He isn't listening. You're probably just asking the wrong questions.

content: Enjoy having hair while you can. Later on in life you may not have a choice as to whether you have a head of hair or not. Most of the ladies that I know said that they enjoy running their fingers through my hair. It would not improve your looks, ( I hate to admit it but you are a decent looking dude as you are,Not as good looking as I am of course)In essence a shaved head would look artifical at your age.

content: I keep Dennis' hair shaved, #1. He has about 10 hairs on the top too. If you still have all your hair, don't shave it. I am 55, and I like a man with short hair, not long. 'http://cool-mens-hairstyle.blogspot.com/2009/04/mens-short-hairstyles.html

title: My head - it's nekkid!  A poll of what do

content: quote: Originally posted by FollowMeInfantry: We seem to have a stalemate, here. One person loves me (and Wanda says that it ain't her, LOL), 2 people feel that I'll fry their computer in my ugliness, and 2 others think I am too stupid to do anything but drink beer. Hmmmm, a quandary... Wanda want me to grow it out. I want it bald (saves money on shampoo), and many here just don't give a rat's azz. HELP ME! Count the "love" responses again, babe! And you have such nice, soft, thick, shiny brown hair -- I love running my fingers through it !! Why you'd want to make it disappear is beyond me! But it'll grow back. And you're still "you", with or without it.
